text: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَـٰلِمُ غَيْبِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ

translation.en.sahih: Indeed, Allah is Knower of the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and earth. Indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts.
translation.id.indonesian: Sesungguhnya Allah mengetahui yang tersembunyi di langit dan di bumi. Sesungguhnya Dia Maha Mengetahui segala isi hati.
